title: Pioneer Story-Based Curriculum for Text-Based Programming Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Computational Thinking and Block-Based Programming Experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with offline activities utilizing school computer labs.

learning_goals: Learners can independently write a text-based program of 50+ lines using Python syntax.
Learners can apply creative problem-solving approaches in programming and present original solutions in 80% or more of assignments.
Learners can improve self-efficacy by 70% or more during the programming learning process and apply at least three self-directed problem-solving strategies in the final project.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
